resources.string: "It's okay to be less than perfect."

"Things you can do to boost your mental state are referred to as mental health activities. Collaborating in mental health activities can improve your overall health, well-being and as well as your sense of inner peace."
"If stress has you anxious, tense and worried, consider trying meditation. Spending even a few minutes in meditation can restore your calm and inner peace."

Mental health is vital to overall personal wellness. It\'s our emotional psychological and social well-being. Here are some health courses that can help to improve your overall psychological well-being.
"We will send an email to your registered ID with \ninstructions to reset your password."
"The role of the therapist is to reflect the being/accepting self\n that was never allowed to be in the borderline."\nâ€• Michael Adzema."
You are not alone. Help is just a\ncall away.

If you are dealing with abuse, trauma or crisis, Ethereal is not enough. It is important that you talk to a person you feel safe sharing what you are dealing with. If there is no one, call one of the helplines below. Things will get better.
Based on your overall health test,\npoints you have secured is 84.
Get help with common mental health\nproblems such as stress, anxiety, depression\nand panic attacks. In a safer space.
Discover and plan the activities that you find\nmost useful. We will remind you beforehand\nand help you self-reflect afterwards.
Stay motivated by logging your mood, stress,\nmindfulness or sleep seeing these changes\nover time.
